task: Fix ReferenceError: process is not defined (Copilot SDK)
findings: The @github/copilot-sdk is Node.js only and cannot run in the browser.
Attempting to use it in `useCopilotAgent` caused the app to crash on load.
E2E tests failed because the app wouldn't render.
Mocking the service resolves the crash but disables AI features until backend is ready.
next_steps: Migrate Copilot SDK logic to Firebase Functions (Backend).
Re-enable AI features by calling the backend.
